reviews.review: Si te gusta los juegos de shooters este es tu juego, porque es lo mas real que te puedes imaginar, no como otros juegos...
great gameplay with tones of toxic team mates you will love it
tak polecam tą jakże zajebistą z cheatowaną w chuj grę jebać cheaterów jestem lepszy bez cheatów ezzz
good game just dont make flashy plays or you will get banned or a low trust factor

es el mejor juego sin duda de competitivo 5 vs 5 pero el mayor cancer que han podido hacer es dejar que el juego gratis y después sacar a la luz el codigo de todo el juego. lllevo jugando a el mas de 5000 horas. He jugado partidos profesionales pero esto se os ha ido de la mano VALVE para mi es una puta mierda vuestro juego actualmente
easy to get vac ban for no reason.
Я даун, поэтому мне нравится эта игра!!!
才第二把 队友就能投票把我t了 ？
prepare for your eyes to hurt
игра отлично подходит для тех, у кого нет девушки, а если она у вас есть и вы играете в эту хуйню, то вы идиот

Apesar de antigo e ainda usar a SOURCE 1, o jogo tem uma gameplay fluida e até que estratégica no competitivo. 
Podemos dizer que o jogo está abandonado pela Valve e seu anti-cheat é uma piada, a possibilidade de cair com um hacker na primeira partida é bem alta.
Recomendo jogar competitivo com um amigo ou com um grupo, pode ser frustante jogar sozinho.

No geral é um bom jogo e recomendo dar uma chance.

Эта игра была бы замечательной, если бы не одно большое НО - Читеры.
Почти в каждом матче.

Да и редко обновления полезные бывают, карты раз в год наверное добавляют, обновляют.

Игра устала, Valve нужно делать новую.
the game is shit bcs when u get above le it's mainly hackers and so on
I GOT VACED FOR NO REASON
very epic and swag. The devs are the CEO of swag.
This game shits on my soul
mükemmel bir oyun ama rank sistemi kötü olmuş
jogabilidade excelente , trabalho em equipe necessário, sem bugs
oyunu çok seviyorum ama şu hilelerden bıktım amk ayrıva source 2 iptal edilmiş sizin yapıcqanız işi ama haklarını yemeyelim efsane oyun
Hilelere çözüm bulunduğu gibi ortalığı tekrar kasup kavurcak oyun.
поиграл пару часов и мне доходчиво объяснили кто я, кто мои родители и что у меня с руками 10\10
Very toxic and only fun sometimes but its love!

Its good for people who aren't new to fps shooters and comp play, but unruley to new players if your new to this game i wish you luck. i would suggest playing offline aim trainers before going into a live match, I hope all new players love this game just as much as everyone else. there are some mean/bad/toxic players in the community though so don't take it to heart if you get called a ****** or a ****** thats all i really have to say. Enjoy -TheWindyBoi
So listen up, you can play the game CS:GO for free, but it's shit if you don't have prime. Pretty decent game.
